name: Wall Ball (Laze)
description:
Bounce the ball against the Wall. Don't stop the volley with the wall or you lose!

Controls

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space

Trap (in midair only) - J

Kick - K/Left Click

Lob - L/Right Click
